title: OWLS (Older Wiser Local Seniors) Community Pop-In

accessibility: Ramp and disabled toilet.
address: Thorner Over 60’s Association, 31A Main Street, Thorner, Leeds
description: Free Wi-Fi, free hot drinks and biscuits, device recharging. Facilities available to anyone over 60.
title: Thorner Over 60’s Bungalow

accessibility: Town parking on streets nearby up to 2 hours. Sainsbury's up to 4 hours. Accessible access and toilets for wheel chairs. Ground floor. Churchyard paths have inclines.

description: The Church Parish Room is an annexe to the main building accessible through the church North door. It has simple hot drinks and snacks available and free WiFi. We have been running Open House as a Safe Space for a long time and extend now as a Warm Space
title: Otley Parish Church Parish Room

Ramp access to the front of the building and accessible toilets available.

address: 2-7 Woodhouse Square
description: A warm and friendly welcome. Here you can sit, read, play games (we have a range of free games to use), use our free wi-fi, or simply relax in our cafe space. We have some free lunch time craft activities which can be booked via our website.
title: Swarthmore Education Centre

accessibility: Fully accessible

There will be magazines, books and daily news papers available.

accessibility: our venue has wheelchair access and accessible toilets. There is no parking on the Church site but usually space is available on Mill Green Road LS14 5JN or on Swarcliffe Drive.

title: Stainbeck URC

title: St Richard's Church LS14 1BX
